tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE company_social_media_mentions (
    mention_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mention_text TEXT,
    mention_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_name TEXT,
    company_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_complaints (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    complaint TEXT,
    complaint_date TIMESTAMP,
    resolved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerComplaints (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  complaint_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CompanyDetails (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  post_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE PostReactions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  reaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Mentions (
    mention_id int PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id int,
    mention_text text NOT NULL,
    mention_timestamp timestamp,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaAccounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerComplaints (
    complaint_id int PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id int,
    complaint_text text NOT NULL,
    complaint_timestamp timestamp,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaAccounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Responses (
    response_id int PRIMARY KEY,
    mention_id int,
    response_text text NOT NULL,
    response_timestamp timestamp,
    FOREIGN KEY (mention_id) REFERENCES Mentions(mention_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReputationManagement (
    management_id int PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id int,
    action_text text NOT NULL,
    action_timestamp timestamp,
    FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaAccounts(account_id)
);
